attributes.action: Ban legalised discrimination against minor political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day about us we see large and major political parties and only few small ones.These 'big bully' parties get all the limelight and all the television and media coverage so can persuade people better than small ones.This is grossly unfair and and an undermining of the true democratic process.All parties however small should be legally entitled to exactly the same coverage as any other in the media.If a report is made against or in favour of one there should be reports on all.That is equality and fairness at work.Banning Political parties is dictatorial.
